channel.title: Ellie Goulding on mattischrome

item.title: Ellie Goulding - Bright Lights
item.description: So today my random album script picked out “Bright Lights” by Ellie Goulding, an album I wasn’t sure I’ve ever listened to. I looked in my music library and there it was! As a result this is not so much an album revisit as an album visit.
